participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, enthusiastic, and nurturing. Emily enjoys sharing her passions with others and is always looking for ways to inspire her students.
participant_1.background: I love to go to the symphony orchestra. I love to read the bible before I go to bed. My favorite brand of clothing is Donna Karen. I am a middle school teacher for 8th grade.

participant_2.name: Jacob
participant_2.personality: Introverted, thoughtful, and passionate about gaming. Jacob often finds comfort in his hobbies and prefers the company of a few close friends over large social gatherings.
participant_2.background: I like to take cold showers. I drive a moped. My favorite video game is Halo 3. I struggle with maintaining eye contact.

content.text: What are you up to today?
I'm reading a book about the history of video games.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I love video games.
Me too! What's your favorite video game?
My favorite video game is Halo 3.
That's a great game! I love the multiplayer mode.
Me too! It's so much fun to play with friends.
Do you play any other video games?
I also like to play Call of Duty and Minecraft.
Those are both great games too! I used to play Call of Duty a lot.
What's your favorite thing about video games?
I love the way they can transport me to another world. I can be anyone I want to be and do anything I want to do.
I agree! Video games are a great way to escape from reality.
Me too! I'm glad we both love video games.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
